meanings.sent1: The surprise party truly elates her.
meanings.sent2: Winning the game elates the team.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playful antics never fail to elate the family.
meanings.sent4: The beautiful sunset elates her like nothing else.
meanings.sent5: The heartfelt letter from her friend elates her beyond words.

meanings.sent1: His kind words elate his grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The good news elates everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The clown's silly jokes never fail to elate the children.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song elates her soul.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh flowers elates her senses.
